org.cougaar.core.node
Interface NodeBusyService

All Superinterfaces:
Service
public interface NodeBusyService
extends Service

This service is used by agents to note when they are busy in an action that may block communication, such as persistence.

This service is advertised in the root service broker for access by all agents on the node.

Method Summary
 java.util.Set getBusyAgents()
           
 boolean isAgentBusy(MessageAddress agent)
          Anybody can check if an agent is busy.
 void setAgentBusy(boolean busy)
          The agent using this service must have already identified itself using the setAgentIdentificationService before calling this method.

          The component using this must supply AgentIdentificationService capable of correctly identifying the agent using the service before it can call the setAgentBusy method.
 

Method Detail

setAgentIdentificationService

void setAgentIdentificationService(AgentIdentificationService ais)
The component using this must supply AgentIdentificationService capable of correctly identifying the agent using the service before it can call the setAgentBusy method.

setAgentBusy

void setAgentBusy(boolean busy)
The agent using this service must have already identified itself using the setAgentIdentificationService before calling this method. This avoids the possibilility of misrepresenting the agent.

isAgentBusy

boolean isAgentBusy(MessageAddress agent)
Anybody can check if an agent is busy.

getBusyAgents

java.util.Set getBusyAgents()
Returns:
an unmodifiable set of busy agents (MessageAddress elements).
